pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, January 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, January 28, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting and deliver brief remarks.

Room 237-C
Centre Block

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
